post.body: I'd bang him like a screen door in a hurricane.
mmmmm....Graverobber porn...
yeah...men have 0jenna Loves Briana, we have Zydrate Anatomy. ;-)
what? I still love her as much as I ever did. ;-)
what, did roomcunt not pay the gas bill?
you'd understand if you were a chick or gay!
hopefully tomorrow night will be better
no d&t :( just movie. Kinda bad turnout too :(
@rikkisixx when I get home I'll blog abut the girls I met...funny shit
I think he has enough Zydrate for all of us.;)
maybe he'd be into it if you dressed as Amber.
I call getting thrown up against a wall Amber-style.
I'd be happy to share with you both.
@praguematic it's amazing what you can get used to. In kc, it wasn't cold til it was 20 or less. Now that i've been here, ...
i've had ones that were 30 mins too. The wonders of birth control.
it's ok. We all get our periods at inopportune times.
Graverobber has the POWER tho!
awesome!! Bring more friends too! Be careful tho, your gf might wanna leave ya for the Graverobber! ;-)
gotya
me? Or one of the others?
why do I think you had something to do with that?? ;-)
OMG yes!!!!
yes I did, actually
you owe me a new laptop...i'm probably gonna short mine out from licking the screen.
@praguematic the downsides are shitty weather and the inability to pump your own gas. I'll stay in tx thx.
good thinking. Just make sure it's a diff store.
i'm #3 damnit. You best bettah recognize!
all i'm sayin is if she gets away with it, i'm shopping in Oregon from now on. I've gone thru the hell of trying to do re ...
of course I want her to come! We can share! :D
you might not have any recourse tho. The copyright acts make cash refunds impossible.
if you get to come out for that show, ima cry out of jealousy. I can only do one or the other, since i'll be in school. :-(
unfortunately, i'm almost positive that you'll get store credit. BB is not flexible at ALL with that shit.
I hate to rain on the parade, but most places, if a game is opened they'll only exchange it. No refunds. :(
ahh, I see.
goes without saying. I was just assuming that you were referring to the wine highly regaled by bums everywhere.
"enjoy" and "Night Train" are words that DON'T go together. You do realize that, right?
that's how it was here up until today. Now it's gorgeous out.
glad to see I'm not the only one who had an "A Christmas Story" Christmas!
no, bar shot. I'm directly behind the only dude actually looking at the camera.
I'm at Texas 76635 - http://bkite.com/02Xij
A cold shower is in order when I get home. Damn this Graverobber fantasy.
i@praguematic lmao

Any theater with a full coffee bar and beer is ok by me.
Yeah, my brother is pissing me right the fuck off, and if he calls again, I'm not answering.

Fuck. I'm going into hibernation mode. Goodbye summertime weight loss!
